author: christophe.hoche
title: Real Estate Fractional Ownership
description: 房地产是全球最大的资产类别。但大的量级和低的流动性解释了为什么进入 "房产阶梯 "是困难的。

f6_assessments.q0: 你好，阿达的选民们!在阅读了提案和查看了网站https://www.the-entr.com/ 之后，我认为将产生收入的房地产分块化，并能够通过留在该处使用你的分块所有权的想法，无疑将促进Cardano的发展！这是因为房地产是金融中的一个乐高，富人在历史上一直用来维持和扩大他们的财富。提案中提到的部分所有权将使每个人都能更容易地参与到这个惊人的财富创造工具中。在我看来，随着我们的审查进展，这个提案可能在某些方面有所欠缺，但是它的影响确实可以成为Cardano区块链上的一个非凡选择我想确保对这个想法给予肯定，特别是看到他们如何解决房间里的大象，当它涉及到房地产分块化时，这就是身份验证。与Cardano合作，使用Atala棱镜，是真正使房地产能够被大众所接受的关键。
f6_assessments.q1: 关于提案团队和团队成员的经验，我有信心他们有能力完成他们所说的工作，正如他们在这里提到的计划--"下一步是创造流动性，为此我们想建立一个二级市场。区块链技术"，但让人失去信心的是，他们指出为什么建立一个二级市场和拥有流动性是很重要的，但他们似乎没有深入研究如何使用资金来实现这一目标的技术层面，我不清楚这些资金是否只是用于流动性，或者他们是否会使用一些资金来建立市场场所？我认为在看到成品所需的时间和资金的分配上有更多的透明度是很重要的。另外，如果能有一些关于建议的开发团队和他们在其中的作用的背景资料，以描绘这个建议将如何表现出来，那就更好了。
f6_assessments.q2: 在能够审计提案方面，我们没有明确的时间线或里程石来审计提案。也许我错过了什么，但对我来说，这个计划似乎更像是一个推销，而不是一个计划。如果我真的错过了什么，我希望这篇评论能被标记出来，因为我非常看好这个提案的影响，但我陷入了两难境地，因为我的工作是在这些评论中不偏不倚，忠于选民。我希望提案人能够为这个提案的可审计性增加更多的内容，因为不幸的是，我们唯一能够审计的是市场是否能够建成，而我们没有一个明确的时间线来说明何时能够建成，所以我不得不给这个提案的审计打2分，原因我已经在上面提到。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal focuses on fractional ownership of the fully managed real estate to lower the entry amount, remove non-monetary friction and facilitate liquidity. Since the detailed plan was not well-prepared [no goal, no roadmap, no KPIs/metrics, no risk, and mitigation]. As a result, potential impact can not be seen. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q1: There is not much information provided, as mentioned, there is not much proof of feasibility to evaluate. As the proposer said that "This is a complex project with multiple components", and fractional ownership in the real estate required more detail [in the plan] than this. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's feasibility, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q2: As mentioned, since this proposal is incomplete [no profile description and links for verification, doesn't have any roadmap or KPIs, the budget structure is not defined, and the risk is not defined], transparency is at a low level, especially for a complex topic of there is not much proof of feasibility to evaluate. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

f6_assessments.q0: Real estate fractional ownership and crowdfunding real estate future is definitely a future trend and cryptocurrencies may play a big role in there. Decentralized finance may also play a big role, but unfortunately the proposal does not clearly explain how the plan addresses this specific challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has proven track record in the "fractional ownership" business, but unfortunately technical competence is not sufficiently presented in the proposal.
The plan is very generic and not detailed enough to assess the likelihood of the proposal to be implemented successfully. It is not explained sufficiently how the budget will be spent.
f6_assessments.q2: Information to audit the progress and the success of the project are not presented in the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer has a background in real estate agent management from Paris. The proposal is to have a brilliant idea to apply Atala PRISM for DID and based on the Cardano blockchain. The real estate buyers will share a portion of an actual real state, and there is a platform going to manage to collect the rent and manage the rental's maintenance. The reality is that real estate in the top 10 cities worldwide is highly unaffordable for most average income earners in those cities. If the project formed a more explicit correlation between ADA holders and real estate businesses and streamlined the earning and assurance module, then the project model would ultimately be a high-value use case project.
f6_assessments.q1:
I believe the proposer a bit rush in writing the proposal to submit. Therefore, the deliverable elements are not provided clearly and are close to being omitted. I provide two quick links below that might help you rewrite and do more research and comprise data for next month if you wish to carry on with your journey.
(Short version) https://t.me/ProjectCatalystChat/60411 or (extended version) https://cardanocataly.st/en/proposers/
f6_assessments.q2: With a $25,000 project requested, there is no information on how the project could be carried out and who is going to be involved. It is genuinely impossible for the community to view the challenge team to monitor and report your project progress. Should you refer to the two links provided in the feasibility box if you ever wish to rewrite and resubmit in the future fund rounds.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal accurately identifies an avenue to boost cardano's defi through fractionalizing real estate. The goals align with the challenge however the goals  are not clearly defined and so it is difficult to determine exact aligment.
f6_assessments.q1: The team appears to have good experience in real estate however there is no reference to experience with plutus, smart contracts or fractionalised tokenisation and so that coupled with no comprehensive breakdown of funds makes the feasibility of this project low.
f6_assessments.q2: No roadmap, KPIs or defining of what success looks like makes this project impossible to audit.

solution: 我们提供完全管理的房地产的部分所有权，以降低入门金额，消除非货币摩擦，促进流动性。
experience: 在银行工作超过25年，拥有丰富的金融和法律专业知识，在不同城市的房地产投资方面拥有个人经验
